member.name: ACTCTX_REQUESTED_RUN_LEVEL
member.summary: The ACTCTX_REQUESTED_RUN_LEVEL enumeration describes the requested run level of the activation context.

member.name: ACTCTX_REQUESTED_RUN_LEVEL.ACTCTX_RUN_LEVEL_UNSPECIFIED
member.summary: The application manifest does not specify a requested run level for the application.

member.name: ACTCTX_REQUESTED_RUN_LEVEL.ACTCTX_RUN_LEVEL_AS_INVOKER
member.summary: The application manifest requests the least privilege level to run the application.

member.name: ACTCTX_REQUESTED_RUN_LEVEL.ACTCTX_RUN_LEVEL_HIGHEST_AVAILABLE
member.summary: The application manifest requests the highest privilege level to run the application.

member.name: ACTCTX_REQUESTED_RUN_LEVEL.ACTCTX_RUN_LEVEL_REQUIRE_ADMIN
member.summary: The application manifest requests the administrator privilege level to run the application.

member.name: ACTCTX_REQUESTED_RUN_LEVEL.ACTCTX_RUN_LEVEL_NUMBERS
member.summary: Total number of possible run levels.
